name: The Logo Creator File
summary: Learn about .TLC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A TLC file is a logo created with Laughingbird Software The Logo Creator, a graphics program designed for creating and editing logos. It typically contains vector graphics and text. TLC files may also include textures, 2D and 3D effects, and a transparent or colored background.
